replies.body: Week 2 is may 9th but week 3 is may 21st? That's not how weeks work Riot....
Should nerf warband next patch we are too strong in the current meta {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Great event! But would recommend some really difficult challenges with some maybe prestige emotes? Like get 3 legendaries or 2 concsequtive aces.
Something a little less basic, the challenges are great atm, but, something with some challenge each week for something abit more prestigous would really make events like these a bit more fun. People love the grind when theres a challenge.

Also, maybe start giving away permanent spawn into game animations like the one you have started for this event. Due it being only slightly impactful in games excpet for the very start. make them challenge related so people can show stuff off. just a secondary thought
United we all are to win games thou
